official_title: A bill to authorize the Bureau of Reclamation to conduct certain feasibility studies in the Tualatin River Basin in Oregon, and for other purposes.
short_title: Tualatin River Basin Water Supply Enhancement Act of 2003
subjects: Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Tualatin River Basin Water Supply Enhancement Act of 2003 - Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to conduct the Tualatin River Basin water supply feasibility study in order to: (1) identify ways to meet future water supply needs; (2) identify water conservation and water storage measures; (3) identify measures that would improve water quality and enable environmental and species protection; and (4) where appropriate, evaluate integrated water resource management and supply needs. Limits the Federal share of the costs of the study, which shall be non-reimbursable and non-returnable, to 50 percent of total costs. Authorizes appropriations.
